participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Energetic and friendly, Emily loves to be active and enjoys spending time with loved ones. She is passionate about fitness and has a nurturing side, especially towards animals.
participant_1.background: My black lab is my best friend. I do yoga every morning. I can also squat 400 pounds. I love the Fourth of July because it's a day to celebrate our country and spend time with friends and family. My brother and I have bright red hair.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, Jordan has a passion for art and music. He is a dedicated student who enjoys exploring different creative outlets and values family time.
participant_2.background: I used my artistic skills to teach children how to create beautiful and creative works of art. I don't have a specific exercise routine, but I try to get some activity in most days of the week. I'm also a full-time student studying radiology at a local college. I've never been to the beach. I play in a band that my parents don't know about.

content.text: What are some of your hobbies?
I play in a band that my parents don't know about, I love to draw, and I'm a full-time student studying radiology at a local college. What about you?
I love yoga, I have a black lab who is my best friend, and I love spending time with my family and friends. I can also squat 400 pounds!
Wow, that's amazing! I wish I could squat 400 pounds. I don't have any pets, but I love animals. What kind of art do you like to draw?
I love drawing nature scenes, and I'm also really good at drawing dogs. Do you have a favorite band?
I don't have a favorite band, but I like a lot of different music. I'm a big fan of the Beatles, and I also like a lot of country music. Do you have a favorite holiday?
My favorite holiday is the Fourth of July because it's a day to celebrate our country and spend time with friends and family. What's your favorite holiday?
My favorite holiday is Christmas, because I love spending time with my family and opening presents.
